create view gold.calendar
AS
select * 
from 
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakesynapsee.dfs.core.windows.net/youtubesilver/AdventureWorks_Calendar/',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    )as quer1
